snippet: Wall Street suffered what was by some measures its worst month in two years as investor confidence eroded.
abstract: Stock market closes what is by some measures its worst month in two years as investor confidence erodes.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street suffered what was by some measures its worst month in two years as investor confidence eroded.

headline.main: With Decline, Market Closes a Dismal Month
